title: SERVIR Thematic Areas and Services
text:
SERVIR Thematic Areas and Services








Thematic Area

Services Portfolio




Agriculture and Food Security

- Crop Monitoring and Condition Assessment  - Desert Locust Risk Mapping (P-Locust)  - Bridging the Gap Between AFS and Weather & Climate


Ecosystem and Carbon Management

- Artisanal Mining Monitoring  - Charcoal Production Monitoring  - Commune-Level Development Planning  - Farmer-Managed Land Natural Regeneration  - Harmonization of Regional Land use/Land Cover Classification System


Water Security

- Flash Flood Vulnerability Mapping  - GroundWater Monitoring  - Monitoring Ephemeral Water Bodies-Wendou


Weather and Climate Resilience

- Seasonal Forecasting


Financial Instruments

- Local Risk Control  - Disaster Preparedness


Sustainable Development Goals

- SDG mapping


Capacity Building

- Technical Trainings


Small Innovation Grants

- Fellowships
